mapper.select: select date_format(create_time, "%Y年%m月") as date, count(*) as articleCount from blog_article group by date_format(create_time, "%Y年%m月") order by date_format(create_time, "%Y年%m月") desc ;

select a.id, a.title, a.summary, a.create_time as createTime, u.username, a.comment_count as commentCount, a.view_count as viewCount from blog_article as a left join blog_user as u on a.user_id=u.id order by a.create_time DESC
